Text.Page:
The corruption in the land doesn't just come from Lok. The {@LinkCreature:28#3011#noxious ovoliths} actually exhale a putrescent gas. We're not clear if it's a natural process or if they were shaped by Arachne in some fashion. Either way, it must be stopped.

Hunt down the ovoliths and save all of our noses.

That's incredible. The air went from an inescapably hideous stench to a merely awful rank odor.

You've been of some use. Thank you.
